column4: there is a small section on mutt and pop on that site: http://www.linuxnovice.org/main_software.php3?VIEW=VIEW&t_id=146
already saw that. didn't work for me. kept getting errors. plus it doesn't use fetchmail the guide only shows how to have mutt directly use pop
you use fetchmail?  Then you don't need to use pop in mutt since your mail will be in a local folder
i guess then i need a guide on fetchmail
